results.title: AVATAR, THE LAST AIRBENDER - THE PROMISE, PART 3
results.author: Gene Luen Yang and others
results.description: This series explores the world of "Avatar: The Last Airbender" from where the animated film left off.

results.contributor: by Gene Luen Yang and Gurihiru
results.title: AVATAR, THE LAST AIRBENDER: NORTH AND SOUTH PART ONE
results.author: Gene Luen Yang and Gurihiru
results.description: The post–animated series adventures of Avatar Aang continue here as Katara discovers that her father is now in charge of her childhood village.

results.contributor: by Gene Luen Yang and Gurihiru
results.title: AVATAR, THE LAST AIRBENDER: SMOKE AND SHADOW PART 2
results.author: Gene Luen Yang and Gurihiru
results.description: The post–animated series adventures of Avatar Aang continue here as children begin to disappear in the Fire Nation Capitol.

results.contributor: by Gene Luen Yang and Gurihiru
results.title: AVATAR, THE LAST AIRBENDER: SMOKE AND SHADOW PART 3
results.author: Gene Luen Yang and Gurihiru
results.description: The post–animated series adventures of Avatar Aang continue here as riots break out in the streets of the Fire Nation capitol.

results.title: AVATAR, THE LAST AIRBENDER: SMOKE AND SHADOW, PART 1
results.author: Gene Luen Yang and Gurihiru
results.description: The post–animated series adventures of Avatar Aang and his companions continue here.

results.contributor: by Gene Luen Yang and Gurihiru
results.title: AVATAR, THE LAST AIRBENDER: THE RIFT LIBRARY EDITION
results.author: Gene Luen Yang and Gurihiru
results.description: The post–animated series adventures of Avatar Aang and his companions continue in this volume, which collects “The Rift” trilogy.

results.contributor: by Gene Luen Yang, Gurihiru and others
results.title: AVATAR, THE LAST AIRBENDER: THE RIFT, PART 1
results.author: Gene Luen Yang, Gurihiru and others
results.description: Strange visions of Avatar Yangchen lead Aang to a refinery owned by the Fire Nation and the Earth Kingdom operating on sacred land.

results.description: The post–animated series adventures of Avatar Aang and his companions continue here.

results.contributor: by Gene Luen Yang and others
results.title: AVATAR, THE LAST AIRBENDER: THE SEARCH
results.author: Gene Luen Yang and others
results.description: This oversized edition collects Zuko and Azula's quest to find their mother in its entirety.

results.contributor: by Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko
results.title: AVATAR: THE LAST AIRBENDER — THE PROMISE
results.author: Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko
results.description: This graphic novel continues where the TV series left off. In this installment, the Fire Lord and the Earth King are at odds.

results.contributor: by Gene Luen Yang and others
results.title: AVATAR: THE LAST AIRBENDER: THE SEARCH, PART 3
results.author: Gene Luen Yang and others
results.description: Fire Lord Zuko’s insane sister, Azula, shows her true colors while Avatar Aang travels to the spirit world.

results.contributor: by Rick Remender and others
results.title: AVENGERS AND X-MEN: AXIS
results.author: Rick Remender and others
results.description: The Red Skull + Charles Xavier’s brain = Red Onslaught! Can anyone stop him from taking over the world?

results.contributor: by various
results.title: AVENGERS VS. X-MEN
results.author: various
results.description: The title says it all: the Avengers, led by Captain America, take on the X-Men, who are following Cyclops. Neither team will remain unchanged.

results.contributor: by Kieron Gillen and others
results.title: AVENGERS VS. X-MEN: CONSEQUENCES
results.author: Kieron Gillen and others
results.description: The Avengers and X-Men deal with the ramifications of their battle over the Phoenix.

results.contributor: by various
results.title: AVENGERS VS. X-MEN: IT'S COMING
results.author: various
results.description: Need to get up to speed on why the X-Men and the Avengers are clashing? These stories may help.

results.contributor: by Jonathan Hickman and Jerome Opena
results.title: AVENGERS, VOL. 1
results.author: Jonathan Hickman and Jerome Opena
results.description: The latest incarnation of the Avengers has a broader mission and a wider membership. Will the new vision of the team be successful?
